entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -33.7°C

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36 with temperature rising to minus 32 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 27. POP 30%
